name: environment_scenario_deploy_my_python_java_application_to_a_specific_cy
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to deploy my Python/Java application to a specific Cyoda environment.

parts.text: deploy my Python/Java application to a specific Cyoda environment.

Ready to deploy — I need a few details to start.

Required info:
- Environment name (e.g., dev, staging, prod) — I must check it exists before deploying.
- Repository URL (Git)
- Branch (default: main)
- App name (will be used as the Cyoda app_name)
- Language (Python or Java)
- Is the repo public? (yes/no)
- Do you already have CYODA_CLIENT_ID and CYODA_CLIENT_SECRET, or should I issue technical credentials for the environment?

Once you provide the above I will:
1. run check_environment_exists(env_name)  
2. deploy the app with deploy_user_application(...) and return the build_id and status monitoring options

[options-single-choice: Provide Deployment Details, Issue Technical Credentials, List Environments]
